lines.p: God will show us favor and bless us;He will make his face shine upon us (Selah)
So that your way may be known throughout the earth,Your acts of salvation among all the nations.
Let peoples praise you, O God;Let all the peoples praise you.

Let nations rejoice and shout joyfully,For you will judge the peoples fairly.
You will guide the nations of the earth. (Selah)
Let peoples praise you, O God;Let all the peoples praise you.
The earth will give its produce;God, our God, will bless us.
God will bless us,And all the ends of the earth will fear him.
